testName: Login with valid credentials and complete main flow

steps.step: Navigate to the ParaBank login page at 'https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm'
Enter the valid username 'invaliduser'
Enter the valid password 'wrongpassword'
Click the Log In button
Verify that the user is redirected to the account overview page
steps.error: Skipped due to critical prerequisite failure

steps.step: Perform various banking actions (e.g., view account details, transfer funds, etc.)
steps.error: Skipped due to critical prerequisite failure

steps.step: Verify that all the expected functionality works as intended

testName: Login with invalid credentials and verify failure

steps.step: Navigate to the ParaBank login page at 'https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm'
Enter the invalid username 'invaliduser'
Enter the invalid password 'invalidpass'
Click the Log In button
Verify that the login fails and an error message is displayed

testName: Attempt to access protected pages without logging in

steps.step: Navigate to the ParaBank Open New Account page at 'https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/openaccount.htm'
Verify that the user is redirected to the login page and cannot access the protected page

testName: Complete flow with valid source account

steps.step: Navigate to the ParaBank login page at 'https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm'
Enter the valid username 'ficusroot'
Enter the valid password 'katal@n@ravi'
Click the Log In button
Navigate to the Open New Account page at 'https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/openaccount.htm'
Select the 'SAVINGS' account type

Click the Open new account button
Verify that the new account is created successfully

testName: Attempt to open a new account with an invalid source account

steps.step: Navigate to the ParaBank login page at 'https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm'
Enter the valid username 'ficusroot'
Enter the valid password 'katal@n@ravi'
Click the Log In button
Navigate to the Open New Account page at 'https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/openaccount.htm'
Select the 'SAVINGS' account type
Select the invalid source account '12345' from the dropdown
Click the Open new account button
Verify that the account creation fails with an appropriate error message

screenshots: Attempt to open a new account with an invalid source account-step-1.png
Attempt to open a new account with an invalid source account-step-4.png
Attempt to open a new account with an invalid source account-step-5.png
Attempt to open a new account with an invalid source account-step-8.png

steps.step: Simulate a network error (e.g., by disabling the internet connection)
Attempt to perform various banking actions (e.g., login, open a new account, transfer funds, etc.)
Verify that the application handles the network error gracefully and displays appropriate error messages to the user
Restore the network connection and verify that the application resumes normal operation
